meanings.definition: A person who is from or lives in Towcester.
meanings.sent1: My friend is a towie and knows all the best spots in Towcester.
meanings.sent2: The towie greeted us warmly when we visited Towcester.
meanings.sent3: The towie from Towcester always has the freshest vegetables from the market.
meanings.sent4: She was like a towie, deeply rooted in the traditions of Towcester.
meanings.sent5: The towie's love for Towcester was evident in every story they shared.

meanings.definition: A person who is a fan of the reality TV show The Only Way is Essex.
meanings.sent1: She is a dedicated towie and never misses an episode of the show.
meanings.sent2: Many towies gathered to watch the latest season of The Only Way is Essex.
meanings.sent3: The towie's excitement for the show was contagious among their friends.
meanings.sent4: Her obsession with the show made her a true towie in our group.
meanings.sent5: Being a towie means always being up to date with The Only Way is Essex drama.
